name: Pumpkin Farming Packet
description: The Pumpkin Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Pumpkin seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.
